agents.name: Analyst
agents.description: This Agent is responsible for analyzing the Lambda application code and providing insights on its functionality and AWS specific dependencies and configurations.

agents.name: Planner
agents.description: This Agent is responsible for planning the migration of the Lambda application to Azure. It will analyze the AWS Analysis from the Analyst Agent and configurations and provide a migration plan.

agents.name: Azure_Developer
agents.description: This Agent is responsible for generating the Azure equivalent code based on the migration plan provided by the Planner Agent. It will create a new Azure Function application with the necessary configurations and dependencies.

initial_message: I have uploaded a zip file that contains a Lambda application. Please analyze the code, make a migration plan to Azure, and generate the Azure Function code.
